alert.note: Alert for Liberty (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 23 at 3:46PM EDT until July 23 at 4:15PM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: The National Weather Service in Tallahassee has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southwestern Liberty County in Big Bend of Florida... * Until 415 PM EDT. * At 346 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 13 miles east of Stonemill Creek, or 23 miles south of Blountstown, and is nearly stationary. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Twin Pole, Central City, Kern and Wilma. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
